name: War and Wit
description:
Download War and Wit: Heroes Match 3 now!

War and Wit: Heroes Match 3 is a funny match 3 puzzle RPG mobile game, which you can switch and match the color block to collect mythical heroes and build up your royale empires.

Plan your moves by matching 3 or more color blocks and blasting carefully to overcome each puzzle dungeons in different styles.

Summon and cultivate legendary heroes, letting them help the fight and save the crazy puzzle world!


Unique Features:


Match 3 Puzzle Gameplay

•Variety of Stunning puzzle scenes.

•Swipe to match 3 or more color blocks in a row and wait until the magic happens.


Summon Heroes.

• Send legendary troops to fight by setting different formations.

• Summon heroes and let them join your royale team.


Global PvP

•Join intense PvP battles with challenging and experienced players from all over the world.


Kingdoms Construct

•Build a mighty, immense fortress that can produce a variety of resources.

•Discover a beautiful, well-crafted royale continent civilization.


Improve Overall Strength

•Upgrade your heroes, castles, constructions and special spells.

•Develop initial puzzles style civilization.


Alliance Support

•Make Friends and establish social networks with your alliance.


3D Amazing Graphics

•Experience legendary monsters, fantasy creatures, epic clan loot, mythical heroes, the magnificent sky castle and visual effects in a 3D fantasy world!

NOTICE: War and Wit: Heroes Match 3 is a completely free-to-play mobile match-3 game, however, there are some in-app items that can also be purchased for real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. Also under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download War and Wit: Heroes Match 3
